userdoc.notice: Recruitment contract for posting a job and applicants applying for it Note: This is just experimental. The jobs are stored on the blockchain which is an anti-pattern because blockchain should not be used as database. Job postings must be stored off-chain, only some of the recruitment processes should be handled by smart contracts
